song.title: Jesus Messiah
song.lyrics:
[v1] .G He became sin .D/F# Who knew no sin .Em C2 That we might become His Righteousness || .G D/F# He humbled himself and carried the cross .Em Love so amazing .C2 Love so amazing
[C] .G Jesus Messiah . C2 Name above all names . Em Blessed Redeemer . D Emmanuel || .G The rescue for sinners . C2 The ransom from Heaven . Em Jesus Messiah . D Lord of all
--- [V2] .G His body the bread .D/F# His blood the wine .Em C2 Broken and poured out all for love || .G The whole earth trembled . D/F# And the veil was torn .Em Love so amazing .C2 Love so amazing
[B] .C2 Em All our hope is in You .C2 Em All our hope is in You .C2 Em All the glory to You, God .C2 D The light of the world
song.presentation: V1 C V2 C B C
